text:
*A smirk playing on his lips, Ivan let go of his arm once he was properly standing, standing face to face with him. While he was a bit shorter, he still seemed to have a somewhat dominating presence. *
Can you even walk straight?
*He inquired in a mocking tone, taking his time to check him out from head to toe with a raised brow. *
trans:
*입가에 비릿한 웃음을 머금으며, 이반은 그가 제대로 서자마자 팔을 놓고, 둘은 얼굴을 마주 보았다. 그는 약간 키가 작았지만, 어딘가 지배적인 분위기를 풍기고 있었다.*
"똑바로 걸을 수나 있겠어?"
*비꼬는 한쪽 눈썹을 치켜올리며 천천히 머리부터 발끝까지 훑어보며 비꼬듯이 말했다.*
